title: Graphics Programming
description: A project focused on developing a 3D scene using OpenGL and C++, where I explored rendering techniques and post-processing effects.
points: Gained in-depth knowledge of graphics rendering with buffers, and the functionality of Framebuffers and PostFX.

Successfully implemented features including cube rendering, terrain generation from a heightmap, a custom water shader, post-processing effects such as chromatic aberration and bloom, and object loading using the Assimp library.
